data.trans: Tìm ra cách giải quyết cho cái gì
data.trans_hint: Tôi đã trầy trật với câu hỏi này trong 3 ngày, nhưng đến cuối cùng tôi đã tìm ra cách giải nó.
data.en_hint: I had been struggling with this question for 3 days, but in the end, I could work it out.
data.content_game_1: I had been struggling with this question for 3 days, but in the end, I could work it out.
data.answer_en_hint: I had been struggling with this question for 3 days, but in the end, I could work it out.

data.trans_hint: Nhiều người cho rằng các môn nghệ thuật là không thực tế và nên trở thành môn tự chọn ở trường.
data.en_hint: Many people believe that arts subjects are not practical and should be optional at school.
data.content_game_1: Many people believe that arts subjects are not practical and should be optional at school.
data.answer_en_hint: Many people believe that arts subjects are not practical and should be optional at school.

data.trans_hint: Ngày càng ít học sinh chọn các môn khoa học để tập trung ở trường trung học vì họ nghĩ rằng các môn nghệ thuật có ứng dụng tốt hơn trong cuộc sống sau này.
data.en_hint: Fewer and fewer students choose scientific subjects to focus on at high school because they think that arts subjects can be of better use later in life.
data.content_game_1: Fewer and fewer students choose scientific subjects to focus on at high school because they think that arts subjects can be of better use later in life.
data.answer_en_hint: Fewer and fewer students choose scientific subjects to focus on at high school because they think that arts subjects can be of better use later in life.

data.trans_hint: Một số học sinh được thôi thúc bởi giải thưởng để có thể học hành chăm chỉ hơn.
data.en_hint: Some students are motivated by rewards to study harder.
data.content_game_1: Some students are motivated by rewards to study harder.
data.answer_en_hint: Some students are motivated by rewards to study harder.

data.trans_hint: Tôi nhớ rằng mình không đam mê các môn khoa học khi tôi còn học trung học. Đối với tôi, chúng rất khô khan.
data.en_hint: I remember not being keen on science subjects when I was in high school. Those were very dry to me.
data.content_game_1: I remember not being keen on science subjects when I was in high school. Those were very dry to me.
data.answer_en_hint: I remember not being keen on science subjects when I was in high school. Those were very dry to me.

data.trans_hint: Ở một số nước phát triển, học sinh không cần đóng học phí cho đến khi học đến bậc sau đại học.
data.en_hint: In some developed countries, there is no tuition fee until the postgraduate level.
data.content_game_1: In some developed countries, there is no tuition fee until the postgraduate level.
data.answer_en_hint: In some developed countries, there is no tuition fee until the postgraduate level.

data.trans_hint: Bạn luôn có thể thi lại kỳ thi đó cho đến khi đạt được số điểm mà mình mong muốn.
data.en_hint: You can always retake the exam until you get the score you desire.
data.content_game_1: You can always retake the exam until you get the score you desire.
data.answer_en_hint: You can always retake the exam until you get the score you desire.

data.trans: Có thanh thế (công việc, vị trí)
data.trans_hint: Nhiều người muốn những công việc có thanh thế như bác sĩ hay luật sư, nhưng điều đó đòi hỏi rất nhiều thời gian và công sức.
data.en_hint: Many people want jobs that carry high prestige like doctors or lawyers, but that requires a great deal of time and effort.
data.content_game_1: Many people want jobs that carry high prestige like doctors or lawyers, but that requires a great deal of time and effort.
data.answer_en_hint: Many people want jobs that carry high prestige like doctors or lawyers, but that requires a great deal of time and effort.

data.trans_hint: Các bậc phụ huynh ở quốc gia của tôi thường muốn con cái họ tìm được một công việc văn phòng sau khi tốt nghiệp đại học.
data.en_hint: Parents in my country normally want their kids to seek an office job after graduating from university.
data.content_game_1: Parents in my country normally want their kids to seek an office job after graduating from university.
data.answer_en_hint: Parents in my country normally want their kids to seek an office job after graduating from university.

data.trans_hint: Sau một thời gian làm việc cho các công ty khác nhau và tích lũy đủ kinh nghiệm, tôi quyết định khởi nghiệp và tự kinh doanh.
data.en_hint: After some time working for different companies and gaining enough experience, I decided to start my own business and be self-employed.
data.content_game_1: After some time working for different companies and gaining enough experience, I decided to start my own business and be self-employed.
data.answer_en_hint: After some time working for different companies and gaining enough experience, I decided to start my own business and be self-employed.

data.trans_hint: Tôi không kiếm được nhiều tiền với công việc hiện tại, nhưng tôi thích làm việc hàng ngày.
data.en_hint: I don't earn a great deal in my current job, but I enjoy working every day.
data.content_game_1: I don't earn a great deal in my current job, but I enjoy working every day.
data.answer_en_hint: I don't earn a great deal in my current job, but I enjoy working every day.
